RTRWH_Legal_Rules.Rule: RWH mandatory in all buildings, rural and urban; included in CMDA Development Control Rules Section 25A
RWH mandatory for plots ≥100 m²; plots ≥500 m² must install functional RWH
RWH mandatory for sites ≥2400 sq ft and buildings with ≥50 units; rebates available under BWSSB Rules
RWH mandatory for new buildings ≥200 m²; required in new layouts/buildings under Telangana Municipalities Act
RWH mandatory for plots ≥300 m² in municipal corporations and municipalities
RWH mandatory for plots ≥1000 m²; required in new constructions
RWH mandatory for new buildings on plots ≥300 m²; compulsory in Jaipur
